title: Patient-Reported Symptom Assessment and Early Chemotherapy Discontinuation in ... - medRxiv

summary.text: **KEY FINDING**: Completing assessments reduced early discontinuation risk by 30% in GI cancer patients receiving CTX.
**TACTICAL WIN [SHIP NOW]**: Integrate automated reminders at day 3 post-initiation to improve assessment completion rates.
**MARKET SIGNAL [ðŸ”´ URGENT]**: FDA mandates PRO data inclusion in trials starting December 2025, highlighting regulatory pressure for ePRO solutions.
**CONCERN**: Self-selection bias may limit the clinical validity of PRO-based discontinuation risk assessments.
